column2: Is NOT §YReviled by Civilised Society§!\n§g...........§!(IE: Is NOT [HasReviledTraitColour_Sload]Sload§!, [HasReviledTraitColour_KnownVampire]Known Vampire§!, [HasReviledTraitColour_BenevolentVampire]Benevolent Vampire§!, [HasReviledTraitColour_Briarheart]Briarheart§!, [HasReviledTraitColour_Undead]Undead§!, or [HasReviledTraitColour_Lich]Lich§!)[ShowUnknownVampireWarning]
